遌遌遌

遌字的基本解释

遌
è
遇，遇到：“死生惊惧不入乎其胸，是故遌物而不慴。”
抵触：“牚距劫遌，又足怪也。”

遌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［è］
［《廣韻》五各切，入鐸，疑。］
(1)相遇，遇见。
(2)抵触。

遌字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　遌； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1261第20
【唐韻】五閣切【集韻】逆各切，?音噩。【廣韻】心不欲見而見曰遌。　又【玉篇】同迕，遇也。【楚辭·九章】重華不可遌兮。【班固·幽通賦】乗高而遌神兮。　【正字通】同遻。互詳後遻字註。遌原从亐作。又???。

遌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
遌字的起名意思

暂无。

Jealous
Basic explanation of words
Jealous
è
Encounter, encounter: "Death and life are not scared of fear, because they hide things but not frighten them."
Conflict: "It's a strange thing to do away with the robbery."
Jealous
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [è]
["Guangyun" has five different cuts, enters the priesthood, and doubts it. ]
(1) Encounter, meet.
(2) Conflict.
Jealous
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [The Department of Characters] 　遌; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1261 No. 20
[Tang Yun] Five Pavilions Cut [Ji Yun] Reverse each cut, the sound is bad. [Guang Yun] I don’t want to see it, but I see it and say 遌.　[Jade articles] The same way, the same. [Songs of the Chu Nine Chapters] Chonghua can't be escaped. 【Bangu·Youtongfu】Ride high and stunned.　【Zhengzitong】Same as 遻. Note after mutual details. Hao Yuan was written by you. also???.

Nothing.

遌物而不慑 наталкиваться на невиданное и не пугаться
